task.title: Edit a Livefyre Component from an AEM Page

context.b: Edit a Livefyre Component from an AEM Page
context.p: Note: You can only configure or edit a Livefyre component in Livefyre Studio.

ol.li: Click the Livefyre Component to configure.
Click the Configure item (wrench) to open the Configuration Dialog.
Click Livefyre Studio in the toolbar to open the App in Studio.
